title: Hour 2 - NBA Season Preview, NFL Injuries and Betting Lines
itunes:title: Hour 2 - NBA Season Preview, NFL Injuries and Betting Lines
description:
Dan considers the upcoming NBA season as players start entering camp and talking to the media. And he explores how injuries to key players can seriously affect betting lines and futures in the NFL.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
